mapper.sql: id, apply_type, purpose, apply_time, start_time, end_time, use_num, room_id, user_id, result, remark, is_delete
mapper.insert:
insert into classroom_apply
id,
apply_type,
purpose,
apply_time,
start_time,
end_time,
use_num,
room_id,
user_id,
result,
remark,
is_delete,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{applyType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update classroom_apply
apply_type = #{applyType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
use_num = #{useNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update classroom_apply set apply_type = #{applyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, use_num = #{useNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT ca.id id, apply_type applyType, purpose, apply_time applyTime, ci.room_name classroomName, ca.result FROM classroom_apply ca, classroom_info ci WHERE ca.is_delete = 0 AND ci.is_delete = 0 AND ca.room_id = ci.id and ca.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ca.id, ca.purpose, ca.apply_time applyTime, ca.start_time startTime, ca.end_time endTime, ca.use_num useNum, ci.room_name roomName, u.user_name userName, u.job_level userJobLevel, ca.result from classroom_apply ca, classroom_info ci, user u where ca.is_delete = 0 AND ci.is_delete = 0 AND ca.room_id = ci.id and u.id = ca.user_id
result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
